m_szDocTitle: EV Sales Up 228.88% In 2013 In US (2013 Electric & Hybrid Vehicle Sales Report) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: EV Sales Up 228.88% In 2013 In US (2013 Electric & Hybrid Vehicle Sales Report) Originally published on EV Obsession . Hybrid and electric car sales for December and 2013 as a whole have all finally come in. You can see the specific numbers above, as well as a chart showing the leading models (for Dec 2013, Dec 2012, all of 2013, and all of 2012). When you’re done having fun with the interactive chart above, below is my commentary on December sales and 2013 sales as a whole. The big, overall news is that 100% electric car sales increased 228.88% in 2013 compared to 2012. To a lesser extent — b
